Package org.genthz.dsl

Interface Metric<T extends Metric<T>>

Type Parameters:
T -
All Superinterfaces:

All Known Subinterfaces:
Selector
All Known Implementing Classes:
CustomOps
public interface Metric<T extends Metric<T>> extends Comparable<Metric<T>>
This interface represents base property of the Selector. Metric is an integer value.
